dialogue.text: Skelly sits alone in a restaurant, staring outside the window and taking a break.
I think today is the day where I start \nrelaxing more...
These past few weeks have been really \nstressful for me, so I think it would be a good idea t-
She watches a Limo approach outside. Every second it got faster, and faster...
Skelly realizes that the Limo is headed for the restaurant. Directly INTO the restaurant.
As she jumps out of the way, the Limo crashes into the restaurant, a man and a woman with top hats getting out of the vehicle.
Yeah, run while you still can, pussies!
The man grinned, slowly moving the focus of his gun around the room.
Now, here’s the catch...
You give me all the good stuff, you get to go home.
You don't wanna cooperate? You're DONE!
The crowd obediently went up to the man, one by one, giving up all of their valuable items.
His plan seemed to be working smoothly, until he noticed Skelly silently sitting at a table.
He stared at her for a moment, then walked up to her.
And where is YOUR stuff?
My stuff?
You know, your valuables! Expensive items!
Not here, that’s for sure.
You're playin' with me. How did you even get to eat here? Surely you've got a wallet on you or somethin-
Skelly stood up, staring at the man in front of her.
Whatever I have is none of YOUR concern. Mind your own damn business, dude.
The man growled.
Just who do you think you are?
Skelly. Who do YOU think YOU are?
I'm Theesl! I'm the leader of this gang, and I'm here to steal from this dump!
Yeah, sure. That car you just crashed should be considered a dump aswell.
Are you serious right now? krill! WHERE’S MY GUN?!
The woman approached the two, handing them both microphones.
Wh- The hells this for?!
Just shut up for a second, will ya?
Krill turned to see Skelly, still sitting at her table.
Name's Krill, you dont mind singin a lil do ya?
Uh, sorry, this past month has been stressful so im trying not to-
No? Good, cause im tryna get hot head over here to stop solving everything with violence.
Krill, this is a robbery!
Shut up, you only went here cause you were hungry and didnt wanna pay!
Plus I've heard rapping's quite a popular way to solve conflict 'round these parts."
Sorry, but I think you misundersto-
Tell ya what, humor us a lil and we'll let you go, along with everything else we stole.
But of course, you can decline, then I'll just give Theesl what he wanted from the start.
Ughhh. Ok fine, but only a couple, I'd really rather be doing something else.
Great! I'll lay down some beats, babe, you start.
Fine! but I'm keeping my gun. This better be worth my time...
